content.prompt: Which of the following scenarios best illustrates delegated discretionary authority?

choices.label: Congress giving the Environmental Protection Agency the power to establish national pollution standards
The chair of the House Committee on Energy and Commerce appointing the chair of the Environment subcommittee
The House of Representatives establishing the jurisdiction for the Committee on Energy and Commerce
The president nominating the attorney general of Ohio to serve as administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors illustrated in different scenarios in context.
